title: Church plaque font
content:
I'm duplicating a plague for a church but I have no idea what font this is. If i don't find it I'll have to redraw every letter so any help would be appreciated, thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415103855im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Church-plaque-text_4099.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Church-plaque-text.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415103855/http:/typophile.com/files/Church-plaque-text.jpg) | 236.15 KB |
author: 342obed

comments.content: Surely not a font but hand engraving/drawing/stenciling . . . ?

In the ballpark, but only barely...

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/saturday-morning-toast/italic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415103855/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/saturday-morning-toast/italic/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/saturday-morning-toast/italic/")

Approximate matches for the majority of the swashed letters can be found by digging through the three thousand plus glyphs of Bookmania Italic

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415103855im_/http:/typophile.com/files/BookmaniaItalicSS19_MNSY_SM_5317.jpg)
  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/bookmania/italic/glyphs.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415103855/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/bookmania/italic/glyphs.html "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/bookmania/italic/glyphs.html")  
Don
